name: Gooman
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2021! 

Thanks for checking out Gooman! You're a gooball just trying to make your way through the world.

  • Split and join yourself to complete the challenges.
  • Only small goobs can go through the portal
  • Only small & medium goobs can go through doors
  • Only medium & large goobs can hit buttons
  • Only large goobs can push boxes
  • Press "R" to restart a level

Please Note: We tried our best to rid the game of bugs, but we may have missed some. If you find one, please comment and we'll try to fix it!


Made in less than 48 hours by:
John Chase
Jason Brown

All art, sound and music, and programming created within the 48 hours.
